preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ACL1%, AEH1%, AMU1%, ASA1%, ATS1%, AZA1%}

unitName: Borders, people and identity: Migration in the 21st century
description: This unit explores the political, economic and social determinants of national migration policies and the impact that these policies have on a wide variety of migrants around the world.  We will investigate the roles that states, intergovernmental organizations, nongovernmental organizations, and human traffickers play in facilitating or preventing the ever increasing movement of peoples across borders.
